name: Uru Dagal
description:
Uru Dagal (the gigantic city in ancient sumerian) is a short game taking place in the infinite and enormous city of the same name. Its history as been lost through generations and generations inside the concrete walls and now a journey to uncover the story of this place.

Mostly inspired by the manga BLAME! and the Piranesi's prisons architectures, the game has been developped for the Oculus Quest system. It proposes a contemplative and wandering experience inside this cryptic and overwhelming urban space.

⭐️Don't forget to rate and comment if you had the opportunity to try it ! ⭐
